top_comments.comment: You should totally change the trees to these birch ones from last episode. They will look fantastic and add a bit of contrast

comments_since_last_sample.body: You should totally change the trees to these birch ones from last episode. They will look fantastic and add a bit of contrast
Iskall seeing flying gravel : Wait. That's illegal.
I reckon you should have left the coal, it'd have added another texture to the build and as it's coal it wouldn't look out of place unlike some of the other ores.

An Idea for the "Hidden" elevator.. Because you said that you want to incorporate water to the build, how about making it behind a waterfalls. The only dpwnside is that it's  the same idea as mumbo did but why not
Make rocks made of amethyst blocks for the enchanted feeling
Great Vid! Would be really cool to use some of the plateaus for holding some animals. Could see goats and sheep. Maybe make a little farmer's hut with a villager and a dog. That would be super cool.
So, the face with the amethyst eyes reminds me of Bernie.

glow lichen would look awesome on this build !
also I'm really impressed, i find the ravin actually grand, cosy and enchanted, you managed to pull off the three!
I’m a bit late but you could add spore blossoms to the trees for partial effects
